hotels.title: Hyatt Zhuhai Retreat with Indoor & Outdoor Pools, Rooftop Bar & Spa
hotels.description: Experience the allure of China's Greater Bay Area with a stay at this luxurious retreat. Situated in the heart of Hengqin Island in Zhuhai, the hotel offers a sophisticated escape in a vibrant destination. Discover the nearby Chimelong Ocean Kingdom, one of the world's largest marine theme parks, or indulge in retail therapy at the Hengqin Port Commercial Plaza. The hotel's world-class facilities ensure an unforgettable stay. Dine and drink at one of the many on-site restaurants and bars, each offering a unique culinary journey with a selection of drinks, or keep active at the fitness centre. Venture beyond the hotel to explore the area's cultural heritage, or take a short ferry ride to the bustling metropolis of Macau.
